评论详情: Like so much I would buy more!  I’m 5’9 and 165 lbs and an XL was perfect for a loose oversized fit!
This is a great sweatshirt for the price! It’s soft, slightly oversized, really glad I bought it. Will be buying more colors!
Very comfortable and soft. I love the material
I like this sweater but IMO it runs small and shrinks. All that to be said you get what you pay for.
I bought oversized xl and I’m a medium and it fits good but the sleeves are short. I’m only 5’2” so I shouldn’t have that problem.

评论概述: Disappointed. It’s very shedding. Have lint all over pants couch.
评论详情: Although soft the fleece is everywhere shedding on clothes furniture when I set
Item runs very very small Shrinks when washed and dried
Nice and soft. Love that it's oversized. Comfortable. Washes nicely.
Not two toned like the pic. Still cute and soft inside.

My complaint it the color is not what the picture shows. It is a tan color with a slightly lighter neckline, cuffs and hem.  Nothing like the picture. The sweatshirt is oversized as stated. I got L rather XL and it fits pretty good.  I'm short 5'2" so it's long but looks good with leggings.  I'm very disappointed that the color is so wrong, but I will keep as it seems to be made well.

It's not as soft as advertised, but is still soft enough. I really do like the fit and how it hangs. It's been washed and damp hung up. Washed very nice. If on sale again I recommend. 5'6 130 pounds for reference I got a medium.

I like the color block on the sleeves and neckline. Super soft and heavy enough for cold weather. That said- it’s not over sized at all. I’m 5’ 2” and usually wear petite clothing… it fit true to size upon arrival and after 1 wash the sleeves are already too short.
Arms shrink up super short after one wash

评论概述: The colors are not as they appear on the website.
评论详情: The picture on the website looks like the band around the bottom and the area near the neck are a much lighter contrasting color.  However - when I received the package - the entire shirt is the same color.  Not at all what I was anticipating.

The color variation in the sleeve cuffs, bottom and collar hems aren’t as prominent as the picture portrays. It’s a bit hard to even see that the trims are a lighter color than the sweatshirt unless you’re in bright light. I was expecting the trims to be more of an ivory but they are only a shade lighter than the actual sweatshirt material.  The quality of the fabric is great and the sizing was perfect. I’m 5’1” and 160lbs perfect over size fit with a size large.

Exactly as shown! Has oversized fit and is lightweight, but keeps you warm. Very easy to pair with puffer vest, jean jacket etc. Not cheaply made and has not shrunk during multiple washes! Very happy with this purchase!!

评论概述: Neckline is deformed and it's not super long and comfy
评论详情: the crew neckline is definitely not as thick and fitted as pictures show.  i sized up to an XL for an oversized comfy sweatshirt and it's not that big nor comfy and the sleeves are kind of short.  Also the neckline is thin and misshapen.  Not great.

I love this sweatshirt! The oversized fit is super comfy and perfect for a cozy day, and the color block design gives it a trendy vibe. The fleece lining is soft and warm, making it great for chilly weather. It’s one of those pieces you can dress up with jeans or keep casual with leggings. Definitely a go-to for staying stylish and comfortable!
A little too over size, size down
Love this sweatshirt! Soft on the inside and great length!
My daughter's go to sweatshirt brand. So soft and comfortable

Wow now this is a nice feel good sweater or sweatshirt. The material feels great on my skin and the color looks awesome. Looks great with jeans or shorts. I totally recommend this product. I am gonna purchase more as a matter of fact! Peace and Good Vibes!

评论概述: Better than what I’ve purchased so far this year
评论详情: It’s definitely not over sized. It’s true to size, and the bottom is not loose as the photo makes it look. It’s tight to my hips. I haven’t washed it, but it seems good quality.
The inside is so soft! The fit is perfect ordered a medium 5ft 9 175 lbs. So soft and comfortable!
Not oversized at all. I am usually a medium, and I ordered a large. This is much shorter than pictured; the elastic band is also tight at the bottom.
I LOVE this sweatshirt.  It is oversized!  I am 5-5 and about 150 pounds in a size medium.  It is a great sweatshirt to lounge around in!

The oversize charakter is not so confortable like I thought. I am nor thick either to thin, and I like Sweatshort with a flexible material, here is the material no flexible like I thought. Hm. But it looks nice.

评论概述: Sleeves are too short after washing.  The rest is great
评论详情: I really liked this sweatshirt.  I washed it in cold, and the sleeves shrunk a lot, to the point that when you put your arms any way but straight, they went up almost 3 1/4 up my arm; the rest was fine.  I am going to try the next size up because it is comfortable. Update: I received the next size up.  Washed it and sleeves still shrunk, just above my wrist.  It is my go to sweatshirt, really like it, but the sleeves are an issue.

I have almost all the different styles of Trendy Queen sweatshirts. I love the hoodies but I wanted a simple non-hoodie. This one is perfect! It’s not too thick; perfect for a fall day. The inside is soft and very cozy. After a wash and dry, it came out even softer. I normally wear a medium and this one fits me a bit oversized, exactly the way a sweatshirt should fit. Love it.

This sweatshirt is a necessity for the fall and winter! It is so soft and very warm. You don't need to size up for an oversized look. I also love the neck detail that gives it a unique look. I also think this can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion. If you need to lounge this is perfect, but if you need to go out, it can be spruced up. I'll be wearing this on repeat!

I have to admit, the color, feel, and appearance to this sweatshirt is amazing. I got it in a size small but it came out really really oversized. I’m not sure if it’s supposed to be that big for a size small or it’s just that I’m short (I’m 5,1) . It basically reaches mid thigh and I don’t like how it sits on me. I might have to save it for later incase I grow taller.
This sweatshirt is really nice. It's thick and soft, but the sleeves are a little short. They didn't even touch my wrists.  I gave it to my daughter who loves it though.

My wife is 5’7”, top 38C, weighs about 190 lb, and wears XL in most clothes. We ordered XL, and it fits her just right.  She likes the top, as it is lined with fleece inside. She says it feels comfortable. However, it's a bit tough to put on and take off, as it doesn't give any stretch. My advice: If you have shoulder mobility issues, do not buy it unless you are sizing up.  The top arrived in a clear plastic bag. Upon opening the bag, I did not noticHenry funky smell. The fabric is not very soft but not rough or scratchy. The stitching seems even inside and out, with no loose strings.  The weather is still hot in California, so my wife hasn't worn it out yet. I will update my review if it peels after wear or fades and shrinks after laundering.  For now, 4* for its appearance and craftsmanship. Taking away 1* because there is no stretch.

The brown is like mocha and the edges are more like beige than cream. I got a small and it’s oversized and comfortable. It’s NOT wide or cropped (thank you so much!). I’ll get it in a different color.
This sweatshirt is very soft and comfortable. I like the detail of the gray collar and hem with the rest of it being black. It's simple but slightly different than usual sweatshirts.
Good crewneck, thick uncomfortable could be a little bit more soft and stretchy and could be more oversized. Good piece though no real complaints

I love this sweatshirt It is thick, soft, and warm like a regular sweatshirt. I really love the color block design. It is oversized and fits true to the size chart. The “coffee grey” is exactly as pictured. Great quality, highly recommend!

评论概述: A really soft and comfy sweatshirt!
评论详情: The inside of this sweatshirt is very soft, and feels good. The material is nice and pretty thick. It is really comfortable and cute. I especially like the neck detail, and the neutral color lets it go with all things. I am very pleased that I can just throw into the washer and dryer and it comes out looking ready to go. It's great!

评论概述: Fit is a bit weird but comfy
评论详情: I'm a chesty18/20 and typically order tops by bust size. I decided to size up 2 just in case, and the XL fits me loosely. However, I don't remember if the sleeves were this short before I washed it but they stop about an inch above my wrists. The collar is very wide, which I like. I have a shorter torso, and this sweatshirt hits me around my hips but rides up a bit when I sit down. The material is smooth outside, soft inside, and of light medium weight. Despite the short sleeves, this is a sweatshirt I can comfortably lounge in.

This oversized sweatshirt is so cozy, comfortable, and well fitting. If you like an oversized fit, you will like this a lot. The blue is bright and bold and really pretty. The material is soft and warm. The quality is really good, too. It washes well and dries quickly overnight when you hang it up to dry. It is a great sweatshirt for the upcoming crisp Fall days and nights. I really like the brightness of the blue because it makes it easy to see in the closet. It’s a great wardrobe staple that everyone should have in their closet.

This sweatshirt is so nice! The color block look is cute but neutral and not over the top. It is perfectly oversized and has a wider look to it so if you are curvier it sits over your hips not on top of them. It is also super soft and comfortable and I can't wait to wear it this fall.
Quality was okay and did not fit oversized like the models.. it isn’t bad but I don’t like it.. I found it very unflattering. It definitely fit but was not oversized and the cut was weird.
This is a great find. The weight is nice and heavy. It feels plush on the inside and the sizing is oversized but not sloppy looking.  This is a great find!

评论概述: Super soft and true to size!
评论详情: This is the most comfy sweatshirt I think I've ever owned! Super soft and fit me perfectly based on their size charts! Feels like it's good quality as well! Held up well to numerous washes and still looks great and feels soft! I would definitely buy this shirt again and again!

Love this sweatshirt. I ordered my usual size (medium) and it's definitiely an oversized fit. It does have drop shoulder and is made of thicker material so you can come off looking a little bulky. But it's nice and comfy and long enough to wear with leggings. I tried it out and it left a lot of fuzzies on my leggings(from the inside) but I had not washed it yet so they might go away after one wash.
This oversized sweater is soft and comfortable although its a little thin. It came very wrinkled and shrunk when I washed and dried it. Its an ok quality but doesn't fit as the picture looks.
So cozy. The material is soft and the inside material keeps me warm. I’m a size xl and this fits me well.

I ordered this in the coffee/tan colour and it’s very nice. There’s not much contrast between the lighter coloured trim and shirt itself unless you’re in bright light, but I don’t mind. I usually wear a 2X, but an XL in this still fits nice and comes down just about my thighs. I’m 5’5”, so I’m fairly short. So I’d say this definitely runs on the large/baggy size. It is 50% cotton, so likely will shrink a tiny bit, but I haven’t washed it yet so can’t comment yet. I always wash on a cold, gentle cycle, but I do use a low heat, gentle tumble cycle. I’ll update this review if it shrinks a lot. It’s cute over leggings and sneakers.

This sweatshirt is cute, though I don't think it's crazy oversized or long. It may be so if you need a smaller size but I don't feel like the larger sizes have enough room in the bust. I am a normal XL and love very big sweatshirts, I normally size up but couldn't in this one. It's relaxed but does not fit like the main picture - the fit more matches the model in the sizing chart picture. My main issue is more the length, I don't think it's what the sizing chart says. 29 inches normally fully covers me in the back but this stops right at my hips.  I kind of hate that Trendy Queen goes up only to XL since I can't size up for a truly oversized look. Besides that, I do like the maroon color. The inside is a regular type fleece. It's kind of your run of the mill type sweatshirt. It's priced accordingly.

Although this sweatshirt is extremely comfortable, thick and soft...the fit is sort of weird. The neck hole seems kinda small but the shoulders are very broad and boxy. It just looks kinda odd. Good for lounging but not as oversized as I expected.

I like the light grey color, it’s really soft and fleece lined so it’s hot. I feel like it runs true to size, I sized up to an XL and it’s oversized on me it covers my butt. It feels a little bulky but I think it will be good for cold weather. I’m 5’8” 125lbs
Fits big. Good for wearing over another shirt. Love the colors

I love a good hoodie/sweatshirt and I've gotten some pretty awesome pieces from Trendy Queen in the past, so I jumped on this as soon as I saw it. To be fair (and honest) you really can't beat the price, so I ordered the gray and the white/blue.  The sweatshirts arrived quick, vaccum packed in a plastic bag. There were some slight wrinkles when I took them out, but no strange odors. I wash everything before wear, so straight to the machine this went, and it only got better from there. I highly recommend washing this before wear because it's just a tiny but stiff at first, but immediately gets nice and soft/relaxed once washed. I washed on a regular cycle/warm water then tumble dried on medium until it was dry.  The material is really nice. It is medium to medium-thick, super soft and nice and cozy/toasty warm. The outer face doesn't pill. Inside, this is a soft fleece sweatshirt, so it (the inside) does get a bit knotty/lumpy, but it's nothing unusual or uncomfortable. The cuffs, bottom hem and collar are very soft, have good stretch and don't get warped or stretched out of shape. They don't have that cheep, shiny polyester look/feel to them either (which I loathe). I actually dislike polyester all around and usually avoid it like the plague. Even though this is 50% cotton, 50% polyester, you don't get that cheep feeling or roughness to this at all. It feels soft and wears like an excellent quality cotton sweatshirt, but luckily can withstand the dryer and not shrink.  The construction is simple, but we'll executed. This has strong/studry stitching and surges, even cuts and hems. There are no loose or rogue threads anywhere on either sweatshirt.  I love a good oversized sweatshirt and I planned on 'sharing' these with my daughter. I am 5'7", 127lbs and 34B. She is 5'8", 150lbs, 36B with an athletic, long, lean build. I went with a size L. It is pretty massive on me, fitting more like a dress. I'm all for oversized, but the large is just too large. It fits my daughter perfect- nice and roomy and relaxed.  Seeing the price is so reasonable, I decided to order ANOTHER set of sweatshirts, same colors, in a Medium for myself. I'll let my daughter keep the larges because she too loves this sweatshirt.  It's easy, comfy and well made- you can't go wrong with these!

I did not find this sweatshirt to fit or look as pictured.  The colors are not true to the pic and barely contrast at all.  This is a light beige, not at all a coffee gray, with cream trim.  That said, the seams match up and are well sewn.  This can be worn with leggings or jeans, for fall or winter.  It is long, just butt covering.  The fabric is a decently thicker, average sweatshirt material.  The inside is very soft.  Over all the fit is OK, slightly baggy.  It does not appear to be very oversized, as pictured.  I bought my regular size, but wish I sized up.  I assume it will shrink some in the wash, based on “cold wash” in the description.  For a 40% off coupon, this is a good buy.
